title.narrative: Flood Resilience Measurement for Communities Phase 2 Extension (Zimbabwe)

description.narrative: Zurich Flood Resilience Alliance (ZFRA) extended its funding for community programming.up to 2024 to continue supporting communities to build resilience when faced with floods. ZRFA is calling for applications from its members to extend implementation projects in the current location or extend to new locations. The proposed work, based on the regional PERC study conducted was originally planned for Malawi but will now be implemented in Zimbabwe

mailing-address.narrative: The Robbins Building, 25 Albert Street, Rugby, Warwickshire, CV21 2SD, United Kingdom
